# isSupported

**Type Property**

Whether touch controllers are supported for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
class var isSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Attempting to create a touch controller on an unsupported device will result in a fatal error.

## Inspecting the touch controller

- **buttons**: An array containing all the button controls managed by this controller.
- **controls**: An array containing all the touch controls managed by this controller.
- **device**: The Metal device the touch control uses for rendering the touch controls.
- **directionPads**: An array containing all the direction pad controls managed by this controller.
- **drawableSize**: The size of the drawable to which the touch controller’s contents be drawn, in native pixels.
- **size**: The size of the view the touch controller’s drawable is embedded in, in points.
- **switches**: An array containing all the switch controls managed by this controller.
- **isConnected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the touch controller is connected to the Game Controller framework.
- **throttles**: An array containing all the throttle controls managed by this controller.
- **thumbsticks**: An array containing all the thumbstick controls managed by this controller.
- **touchpads**: An array containing all the touchpad controls managed by this controller.
